LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_LycanthropeOptions_Desc: Access several options, such as customising and upgrading {0_labelShort}'s' beast form.
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_UpgradeBeastFormDesc:
Various upgrades can be purchased here by spending Consumed Hearts. Gain Consumed Hearts with the Consume Heart ability while in Beast Form.

<color=#E5E54C>Beast Form Abilities</color>
Spend consumed hearts to unlock special abilities for use while in beast form. Many abilities cost lycanthropic stress to use.

<color=#E5E54C>Beast Form Claws</color>
Spend consumed hearts to unlock alternative lycanthrope claws for use while in beast form. Only one beast form claw can be equipped at a time. The currently equipped claws are marked with (E)

<color=#E5E54C>Totems</color>
Spend consumed hearts to upgrade lycanthrope totems. All totem stat bonuses are only active while in Beast Form, unless marked with an (H).

<color=#E5E54C>Traits</color>
Spend consumed hearts to unlock additional traits. Traits are retained if the pawn is cured of lycanthropy.
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_BeastHuntHiddenDesc: Progress this beast hunt to reveal it.
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_BeastHuntHiddenAnomalyD: Reach monolith level {0} to reveal it.
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_RequirementWorker_Missi: requires a psylink of at least level {0}
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_RequirementWorker_Hedif: of at least a severity of {0}
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_RequirementWorker_Inval: {0_label} totem level must be at least {1}
must complete at least {0} beast hunts
must unlock the {0} beast form claws
must equip the {0} beast form claws
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_TransformHuman_Desc: End {0_labelShort}'s transformation, reverting them back to their standard form. All lycanthrope stress will be converted into lycanthrope fatigue, preventing them from transforming again until they have recovered.\n\nCurrent exhuastion duration: {1}
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_TransformBeast_Desc: Transform {0_labelShort} into their beast form. Lycanthrope stress will accumulate during this transformation, which will be converted into lycanthrope fatigue once the transformation ends. If lycanthrope stress reaches 100%, {0_labelShort} will enter a rage state.\n\nMaximum transformation duration: {1}
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_LycanthropeStressGizmo_: The current level of lycanthrope stress {0_label} is experiencing. Lycanthrope stress gradually builds up during a transformation. If it reaches 100%, the lycanthrope will enter a rage state, putting anyone nearby in danger.\n\nStress gain rate: 10 per hour

LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_SaniesLupinusTransition: {0_labelShort}'s Sanies Lupinus has transitioned into dormant lycanthropy

LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_AbilityUnlocked: {0_labelShort} has unlocked the {1_label} ability for use in beast form
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_ClawsUnlocked: {0_labelShort} has unlocked the {1_label} beat form claws for use in beast form
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_StressReduced: {0_labelShort}'s slaughter has temporarily sated {0_possessive} inner beast
